review: when you go to sign in and use it, there's a little triangle at the upper right-hand corner.  Click it and you can broadcast the current page you're on and when you type and use word processing, etc, it will broadcast onto the TV.This has worked so much better than I thought possible.  I'm a home educator and I can use this instead of using a chalkboard and type what I want to teach.  If my student wants to show what their working on, they can also do so, while I sign off for a few minutes and then go back and forth.This is a must-have for the classroom for the school day and for after to chill out with movies and fun.With a wireless keyboard and mouse, you can be up to 20 feet away from the TV and be totally chillin on the couch and surf.This is definitely worth the small price.  All you need is a USB plug to power the chromecast and an HDMI port on your TV
author: Amazon Customer
